name: iot-app-cam1
description: This is a standard multitier application composed by two microservices

microservices.name: iot-app-face-detection
microservices.description 1: low computational requirements and high network requirements to cam1
microservices.deployment_descriptor:
apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: iot-app-face-detection
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: iot-app-face-detection
    spec:
      containers:
        - name: iot-app-face-detection
          image: hello-world
          ports:
            - name: api
              containerPort: 8000
          resources:
            requests:
              memory: 100Mi
              cpu: 0.2

microservices.name: iot-app-face-recognition
microservices.description: high computational requirements and low network requirements to iot-app-face-detection
